sentence.Network_en: The meal itself was not so good — everything was boringly brown including the vegetables.
sentence.Network_cn: 这顿饭本身就不太好吃。所有的菜都是清一色令人倒胃口的褐色，包括蔬菜。

sentence.Network_en: Families like Ray and Rodney's are becoming boringly normal.
sentence.Network_cn: 像Ray和Rodney的家庭一开始趋于平常.

entry.def: Someone or something boring is so dull and uninteresting that they make people tired and impatient.

example.ex: Not only are mothers not paid but also most of their boring or difficult work is unnoticed.
example.tran: 母亲们不但得不到报酬，而且她们做的那些乏味艰苦的工作常常都不为人所注意。

auth_sentence.content: Why waste time on the boringly self-adulatory when interesting guys are available?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why waste time on the boringly self-adulatory when interesting guys are available?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why waste time on the boringly self-adulatory when interesting guys are available?

auth_sentence.content: Beyond the boringly literal front cover is some fine music, not least the title track, a US top-three hit that year.
auth_sentence.res_content: Beyond the boringly literal front cover is some fine music, not least the title track, a US top-three hit that year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beyond the boringly literal front cover is some fine music, not least the title track, a US top-three hit that year.

auth_sentence.content: I can't imagine writing a song about Edison too boringly rich, entrepreneurial and successful!
auth_sentence.res_content: I can't imagine writing a song about Edison too boringly rich, entrepreneurial and successful!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I can't imagine writing a song about Edison too boringly rich, entrepreneurial and successful!
